title: Contests
description: Take part in the constest listed below and stand a chance to get exclusive invitation to GCCD Kolkata. TnC applied.

cards.title: Predict the Prompt
cards.content: Predict the Prompt and tell us what it was

cards.title: Web Insights
cards.content: Improve the Lighthouse rating of the HTML CSS and JS files provided. Download them and edit and submit back to us for evaluation.

cards.title: Lauki
cards.content: Count and return the number of laukis given by our API
